name: Axel the Axolotl Saves the Day
name_original: Axel the Axolotl Saves the Day
description:
A platformer made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 48 with the theme "Deeper and Deeper"

Help Axel the Axolotl defeat the evil Chancellor Blobulos and save the princess in this short and sweet adventure!

However, there might be a little more than meets the eye… See what you can find.
